modName: Victoria Velina - Arrow To The Knee - DELETED
summary:
Patch file to Victoria Velina - Custom Voiced Follower BETA by Choco2114.
This will tone her down and make her less overpowered.
descriptionHtml:
Patch file to Victoria Velina - Custom Voiced Follower BETA by Choco2114.

This will adjust her class/stats/skills/spells/perks to be on par with Serana. Her unique weapons have been greatly reduced in magnitude (over 90% reduction). Torch fix has been applied. This will allow for a normal play through with her as follower.


[u]Compatibility: [/u]
Option is available for Requiem 1.8.x. She will be half as powerful as Serana in Requiem, since you don't have to complete the "Awakening" quest to obtain her.


[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Victoria Velina Revamped - ATTK.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.


[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Victoria Velina Revamped - ATTK.esp after Victoria Velina Revamped.esp.


[u]Credits/Thanks[/u]:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59974/?]Victoria Velina[/url]: Choco2114
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
author: spikyfishy
